title: Disconnects/Ping spikes, Read and Sign if you are having these issues.
body:
So recently, a LOT of players have been having issues with game lag as well as disconnects. Riot needs to fix this as it has made the game unplayable. Losing games in ranked due to this issue, or even wasting 40 minutes in a normal game is unacceptable. This should have been fixed by now or atleast put a warning on the client.

1. Ping slowly increases as game goes on, eventually you disconnect and are stuck at the "attempting to reconnect" screen.
2. The characters are not running back to base when you disconnect which is a flaw of its own.
3. After reconnecting either by waiting 10 minutes, or exiting the game and restarting the game it happens more frequently and your ping spikes immensely.
4. Some games run fine, but after 1 disconnect that game is no longer playable as it will continue to happen.

If you are having this problem please comment on this post with your summoner name! 

-KingMasterNate

Ever since yesterday, I've had a static ping increase from 113 (East Coast :P ) to 144. The game definitely doesn't feel like I'm playing at 144 ping; it's much higher, there's constant jitter and lag spikes but it doesn't show in the latency bar, just like the game is having issues being processed on the server.

It's extremely irritating and makes the game frustrating if not impossible to play.

I've done a network analysis, as well as a pingtest.net test from their Los Angeles servers; I get 82 ping, 0% packet loss, and 0ms jitter. Something's incredibly wrong with League right now. I made a ticket, but for now, I'll just go and play other video games.

4 games I've had myself disconnected after 2-3 minutes into the game (been primarily playing Dominion to work on certain champions). Waiting doesn't seem to fix it right away so I have to exit the game and reconnect. I then get back into the game, play a little bit only to have my ping shoot up again to 500 (sometimes stuck at 700) and the only way to fix was exiting the game. It's way too frustrating and my teammates had been super hostile towards me after those games. 

It doesn't deter me from the game, what my teammates say, however it breaks my heart when I can't even contribute and can't even play a game that I love using as means to pass the time and enjoy with my friends. If I can't even play by myself I'll only screw over my friends if I play with them. 

Admittedly, my internet isn't the super best (get 70-120 as my best ping) BUT I can still play well and have little to no issues. If something does occur I can easily fix it, but this bug crash is ridiculous. The fact I can't wait out the disconnect like any normal disconnect is bad. If I've ever had a moment where it did this (and I have to exit the game and reconnect back in), it was cause the game waited too long for me to reconnect. This is like instant, not even resetting my router fixes it, only exiting the game.

Whatever is causing this, please get it fixed. It's saddening I can't enjoy this game without having such a huge issue.

Ok this is really getting old here, I have been playing this game for about 2 years now. Due to the lag, dc'ing and in some cases( but less common than server issues) people playing pvp or ranked without having maxed their profile level or tested their characters properly, I have avoided playing pvp or ranked games.

   Up until patch 4.18 I haven't had a lot of serious issues ( ping messes once in a while generally due to updates being done while logged in), however now the game client won't properly patch or load to allow me to play. This is extremely frustrating and Idiotic considering the fact that this game is played professionally, worldwide and paid into by the millions. It seems like this game is going down the toilet. The only reason I am willing to wait a day or two longer will be because I enjoyed playing the game and really don't like the "basic" and "cruddy" graphics and feel of other imitators...IE: infinite crisis to name just one.
       If this issue cannot be fixed I feel customers and players alike should "go on strike" and avoid paying any money into this game until this company can fix this issue. Another thing they should do if they wish to reassure everyone is not give free IP points (they're useless to people who have all characters and runes they need), place a youtube video online or a webcast explaining and sharing with the community how much you actually value our input and devotion, and to acknowledge that you have heard our cries and are working diligently to fix them.......Not some stupid automatic machine created "we really care about you" message in the forums. If people want some kind of compensation, try giving RP instead of IP, because RP is real money and IP is free and unimportant.
